dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Nay, I have rested well enough. Oft I am summoned for work, yet I despise it not; thus there is no need for you to worry.
An invisible bell resounds two pleasant, high-pitched rings.
The only sounds within the containment unit are the child's voice and the bell.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: You worry that I may be overstraining myself...? Perhaps I would say that, were the current workload much worse than usual. Yet it is as burdensome as it always has been, thus familiar; which in turn makes it rather... passable.
But the child replies as though he is engaged in a mutual conversation with something.
It is likely that the Abnormality with the head of a butterfly is directly transmitting its voice to this Agent.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: In fact, I find this work—this dialogue—rather pleasant. A conversation with you seems to broaden my perspective on things.
The Abnormality chatting with the child is a rather difficult entity to manage.
T-01-68, also known as Funeral of the Dead Butterflies.
This Abnormality is rather choosy about which employee gets to manage it.
Those with an unjust heart find nothing but a waste of time conversing with it...
... and those that are rash of heart will quickly find themselves exhausted.
That is what makes this child a most fitting employee to manage this Abnormality.

He has an appropriate amount of both a sense of justice and patience; and despite the fact that he is suppressing the Abnormality's impulses, he does it through a gentle method of engaging in a mutual dialogue, not by force.
The Abnormality is probably intelligent enough to recognize that it is an attempt to manage it, but it does not allow it to bother him.
Whichever was the case, it was rare to find an Agent whose mind does not immediately crumble upon conversing with it.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Hm...
A dull sound of a bell echoes once.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Ah, I was merely watching the butterfly resting upon the back of your hand.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: They are... those with no place to return, thus are bound to rest upon you. Is that correct?
Instead of a bell, the large butterfly atop the Abnormality's head slowly flutters its wings.
A behavior equivalent to a nod, perhaps.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Should you perish... will the butterflies flutter away again?

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: As one sits, only to rise again.
There is no easy way to comprehend what this child is saying.
It is rather difficult to understand what he means— He should know that 'death' is not a concept applicable to the Abnormalities.
But...
... the clear, almost refreshing sound of the bell conveyed that this Work session yielded a positive result.
The Abnormality quite enjoyed that response. Probably.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Mm. Then I shall take my leave. Until next time, fare well.
With that, the child exited the containment unit.
He stands there for a moment, gladly enjoying that brief moment of respite...

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: Still trapped in a daydream?

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: ... Captain Ryōshū.
... only to be awoken from his ruminations by the child with a cigarette in her mouth: Captain of the Safety Team.

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: Treating Abnormalities like they're people will only complicate things.

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: Don't make me S.I.T.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: ... I am only giving it the impression of it. As you are well aware, this Abnormality is—

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: At least try to hide your grin when— Tsk. We don't have time for this.

dataList.title: Lobotomy Corporation
dataList.content: [Warning. Dawn of Violet Warning. First Warning Trumpet Activated. All Suppression units in each department—]

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: An Ordeal descends.

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: Yes, it does. You're coming with me.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: ... I don't suppose there is any need for that.
The child wields the guns imbued with butterflies and stands back-to-back with the Captain.

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: Tsk. Things aren't going according to plan.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: What, pray tell, does in this company?

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: ... Stay here and hold the line.

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: If you survive but every single containment unit of this department falls, I'll kill you myself. Got that?

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Ah, that is a manner of death I would very much prefer to avoid...
The child mutters with an exasperated frown while the butterfly bullets continue to blast from his guns.
He'd grown into a very skilled employee over his time here, enough so that he could exchange a few banters with his colleague as he engaged in combat.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Will you not assist, Captain?

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: I'm heading to visit the Information Team to pick up the 'bullets' they moved from the middle layer.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: The bullets... I see. The bullets must be the Shield-type bullets the manager and the Sephirot fire to protect us, then.

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: Hmph. I prefer the bullet that bursts everything it touches. Isn't there true beauty in blast an annoying coworker's head apart?

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: But I suppose the useful ones get to live.

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: The Control Team Captain ordered her men to move the bullet stock from the middle to the upper layer. For some 'information training purposes', she says.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Ah. Is it Captain Faust of whom you speak?

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Then the training cannot have been her 'purpose'... only an 'excuse' to ensure we have access to the bullets.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: As that level of preparation appears rather unnecessary for Ordeals of Dawn... patently, a calamity of greater magnitude is nigh to unfold.

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: It'll be a waste to use the bursting bullet on someone useful like you.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: I heard tale that the Sephirah in charge of Captain Faust's department maintains quite the... dangerously high standard for her subordinates.

dataList.title: Control Team Sephirah
dataList.content: [Testing, testing! Can you hear me, upper layer employees? I will be in charge of the operations for this Ordeal, so please follow my directions!]

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: She can try to come up with something airtight, but she's not smart enough for that. The Captain must have prepared those countermeasures for such emergencies.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Ah, yet the more complicated the structure of a thing is, the greater the room it is for holes to go unnoticed.

dataList.title: Control Team Sephirah
dataList.content: [And I mean all of you, Training Team, Information Team, and Safety Team! I know that our employees can handle this!]

dataList.title: Safety Team Captain
dataList.content: Hmph. I suppose she's not lying. Considering that an employee who 'can't handle it' is no employee at all in her eyes.
With that, the Captain spun around and disappeared into the other side of the hallway.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Haah...
Left alone, the child turns the muzzles of his handguns toward the violet creatures.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: Fruits of Understanding... have you not lost your ways?
He carries out his duty, firing butterflies as lost as his foes.

dataList.title: Safety Team Agent
dataList.content: I mourn you... bloom, and be the path for one another to follow.
In solemn silence.
